AI Description: NetCDF (Network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and self-describing, machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and sharing of array-oriented scientific data.
Core Features: Supports Array-Oriented Scientific Data, Self-Describing & Machine-Independent Data Formats, Efficient Data Storage & Access, Can Store Multiple Data Variables In A Single File, Supports Data Subsetting & Data Compression, Tools For Data Manipulation & Visualization
General Tags: Scientific Data, Data Storage, Data Access, Data Formats, Data Manipulation, Data Visualization
